column2: Security checks on the substrings of an unparsed URL are often vulnerable to bypassing.
column4: '[["repo.magento.com"|"relative:///lib/tasks/magento/install-magento.js:31:104:31:121"]]' can be anywhere in the URL, and arbitrary hosts may come before or after it.
